0.name: Superior Room
0.description: Our Superior Double rooms (for 2 people) are air conditioned and have a queen-size bed (from 160cm to 180cm), a flat screen TV, free WiFi, a safe and have private bathroom (bathtub) with complimentary toiletries and a hair dryer. These rooms all have an office area and are non-smoking.

1.name: Superior Twin Room
1.description: Our Superior Twin rooms (for 2 people) are air conditioned and have two twin beds (from 80cm to 90cm), a flat screen TV, free WiFi, a safe and a private bathroom (bathtub) with complimentary toiletries and a hair dryer. These rooms all have an office area and are non-smoking.

2.name: Family Triple Room
2.description: Our Triple rooms (accommodating 3 to 4 people) are air conditioned and have 3 or 4 twin beds (from 80cm to 90cm), a flat screen TV, free WiFi, a safe and a private bathroom (bathtub) with complimentary toiletries and a hair dryer.
